Room.Name: Carnival Midway
Room.ShortDescription: You are on the midway of the Seaside Carnival and Sideshow.
Room.LongDescription: To the west lies the bustling midway. There are many sights to see and crowds of people waiting for their turn to see them. The midway is home to bizarre and exciting sideshows, and features wierd and unusual life forms and strange artifacts. You can hear the roar and screech of animals to the west. A large banner tells you that a Puppet Show is to the south.
